casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 19, 2007

[Cite as 07/19/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-3639.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-2364. State v. Perez.

Clark C.P. No. 03CR1010. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas for Clark County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to strike Exhibit A of appellee’s merit brief,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
